Uses of Package
net.kuujo.copycat

  • Packages that use net.kuujo.copycat 
    Package Description
    net.kuujo.copycat
    Copycat is a cluster coordination framework built on a Raft distributed log.
    net.kuujo.copycat.atomic
    Provides distributed atomic variables such as AsyncReference.
    net.kuujo.copycat.client
    Provides lightweight, feature complete Raft client.
    net.kuujo.copycat.collections
    Provides distributed collections such as AsyncMap and AsyncSet.
    net.kuujo.copycat.coordination
    Provides distributed coordination resources such as AsyncLock and AsyncLeaderElection and AsyncTopic for publish-subscribe messaging.
    net.kuujo.copycat.io  
    net.kuujo.copycat.io.serializer  
    net.kuujo.copycat.log
    This package provides a standalone segmented log for Copycat's Raft implementation.
    net.kuujo.copycat.protocol
    The protocol layer provides a set of interfaces for communicating between Raft clients and servers in a Raft cluster.
    net.kuujo.copycat.server
    Provides a feature complete implementation of the Raft consensus algorithm.
    net.kuujo.copycat.server.log  
    net.kuujo.copycat.transport
    The Transport layer provides a low-level interface via which Copycat clients and servers communicate.
  • Classes in net.kuujo.copycat used by net.kuujo.copycat 
    Class and Description
    Builder
    Object builder.
    BuilderPool
    Object builder pool.
    Command
    Raft state commands modify system state.
    Command.Builder
    Base builder for commands.
    ConsistencyLevel
    Constants for specifying Raft Query consistency levels.
    Copycat
    Base type for creating and managing distributed resources in a Copycat cluster.
    Copycat.Builder
    Copycat builder.
    CopycatClient
    Client-side Copycat implementation.
    CopycatClient.Builder
    Client builder.
    CopycatException
    Copycat exception.
    CopycatServer
    Server-side Copycat implementation.
    CopycatServer.Builder
    Copycat builder.
    Listener
    Event listener.
    ListenerContext
    Context for unregistering a registered listener.
    Member
    Configuration for connecting to a member of the Raft cluster.
    Member.Builder
    Builds
    Members
    Container for Raft member configurations.
    Members.Builder
    Members builder.
    Node
    Copycat node.
    Operation
    Base type for Raft state operations.
    Operation.Builder
    Base builder for Raft state operations.
    PersistenceLevel
    Data persistence level.
    Query
    Raft state queries read system state.
    Query.Builder
    Base builder for queries.
    Raft
    Primary interface for interacting with the Raft consensus algorithm.
    Raft.Builder
    Raft instance builder.
    RaftError
    Base type for Raft server errors.
    RaftError.Type
    Raft error types.
    RaftException
    Base Raft exception.
    Resource
    Copycat resource.
    Session
    Provides event-based methods for monitoring Raft sessions and communicating between Raft clients and servers.
